task.summary: Renamed JOIN to JOINED, PLACE to PLAY and PLACED to PLAYED. Added arguments assertion (may become an exception). Added toBytes method to Message. Removed parser from Connection, added to map in Colourise. Added some packet writing. Removed colour from server side, colour will be based on identifier.

Marked src as source directory (became unmarked). Moved Card.java to protocol package (required in client and server). Added fromInt method for deserialisation. Add byte casting where necessary. Replaced unused getSocketChannel() with isConnected() in Connection class. Marked fields in Server as final. Fixed lobby writes in Colourise.java. Corrected Lobby.count() return type. Marked game field as final in Match. Corrected Player.write(Message).

Removed "game" fields from Lobby and Match, not required. Added exceptions for Match start/finish. Added Factory class to Message class to help create messages/packets. Colourise is now alerted of game starts/ends by exceptions. Added base exception type.
Corrected signature of Binder.connect Reduced coupling of Connection and Server.

Removed parser from Connection, added to map in Colourise. Added some packet writing. Removed colour from server side, colour will be based on identifier.

Marked src as source directory (became unmarked). Moved Card.java to protocol package (required in client and server). Added fromInt method for deserialisation. Add byte casting where necessary. Replaced unused getSocketChannel() with isConnected() in Connection class. Marked fields in Server as final. Fixed lobby writes in Colourise.java. Corrected Lobby.count() return type. Marked game field as final in Match. Corrected Player.write(Message).

Removed "game" fields from Lobby and Match, not required. Added exceptions for Match start/finish. Added Factory class to Message class to help create messages/packets. Colourise is now alerted of game starts/ends by exceptions. Added base exception type.
Corrected signature of Binder.connect Reduced coupling of Connection and Server.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Corrected signature of Binder.connect Reduced coupling of Connection and Server.
